data.name: Life is Feudal: MMO. Pilgrim Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Pilgrim Starter Pack Includes the following benefits:


  • 15000 God’s Favor

    Premium in-game currency. Can be spent on customization and services in our premium shop.

  • 2 Tickets to abella

    Transfers your character to the Abella - main continent. Abella does not have limitations that Newbie Island have. Cannot be dropped after death. Cannot be transfered. Consumable.

  • One random Weapon Skin unlock

    We will permanently unlock one random weapon skin customization. You will be able to apply this skin across all the characters on your account in this region.

  • Uncommon Hat Skin

    We will permanently unlock one random hat skin customization. You will be able to apply this skin across all the characters on your account in this region.

  • Premium Subscription (60 Days)

    Receive special benefits with the premium account.

Premium Subscription unlocks the following benefits:




  • One random Full Set of Armor Skin unlock

    Unlock is valid for 1 month. We will unlock a new random full set of armor skin every month, while subscription is active

  • One random Weapon Skin unlock

    Unlock is valid for 1 month. We will unlock a new random weapon skin every month, while subscription is active

  • Trading posts free storage size increased

    You can have up to 500 stones in the Central city Trade Posts and up to 1000 stones in all other Trade Posts without paying God's Favors for an upkeep

  • Up to 150 cells of land for private claiming

    available without God’s Favor payments

  • Power Hour (once a day)

    Once a real life day you can enable “Power Hour” feature, which will double the growth of your combat and crafting skills for one hour

  • Death Insurance

    In an event of the skill loss due to the death, your skill loss will be lowered by 5 skill points

data.short_description: Pilgrim Starter Pack Includes the following benefits: 15000 God’s Favor 2 Tickets to abella One random Weapon Skin unlock Uncommon Hat Skin Premium Subscription (60 Days)
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Czech, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit - Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel - Core i5 2.5 GHz, AMD - Phenom II X4 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA - GeForce® 660, AMD - Radeon™ HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit - Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel - Core i7 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA - GeForce® GTX 980, AMD - Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
